stanza.line: As an unperfect actor on the stagestage
Who with his fear is put beside his partpart
Or some fierce thing replete with too much ragerage
Whose strength abundance weakens his own heartheart
So I for fear of trust forget to saysay
The perfect ceremony of love riterite
And in mine own love strength seem to decaydecay
Oercharged with burthen of mine own love mightmight
O let my looks be then the eloquenceeloquence
And dumb presagers of my speaking breastbreast
Who plead for love and look for recompenserecompense
More than that tongue that more hath more expressedexpressed
O learn to read what silent love hath writwrit
To hear with eyes belongs to love fine witwit
